info.title: Enterprise Project - Read Project Priority
info.description: This service enables you to read the project priority code list for enterprise projects. You can use it to make the code list values available for the corresponding Enterprise Project service.

x-sap-shortText: Read the project priority code list for enterprise projects using this synchronous inbound service
